ARJDISP(1)                Arj Software               ARJDISP(1)





NAME
       arjdisp - ARJ simple graphical interface

SYNOPSIS
       arj  [test|archive_name  filename uncompsize bytes comp-
       size cmd_verb]

DESCRIPTION
       The arjdisp command is a graphical interface for arj.

SEE ALSO
       arj(1).

AUTHOR
       This  manual  page  was   written   by   Ola   Lundqvist
       <opal@debian.org>  in  pod  format,  then  converted  by
       Guillem Jover <guillem@debian.org> to nroff format.



3.10                       2003-03-10                ARJDISP(1)
